Summary: 4 lights above Kansas City hovering. 8/21 approx 9pm
divs: Sighting DetailsFriday Aug 21 my daughter and I were at Worlds of Fun on the ferris wheel. We were sitting at the top while people below were loading. I was looking to my left at people on another ride when my 5 yr old daughter kept pulling at my arm telling me to "look at the shooting star". When I finally looked to my right I saw what looked like a shooting star or meteor entering the atmosphere. I saw one very bright light and then suddenly there were 3 more lights under the bright light. They didn't seem to move and seemed very still. I then reached for my camera phone and took several pictures which I currently have on my phone. The Ferris wheel circled approx 3 times and I took pictures each round until the ride was over. I lost track of the lights after exiting the ride.
trends: There have been 134 other sightings in Kansas City
There were 2 other sightings in Kansas City on or around August 21st 2009
